com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration

Class Sword

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Weapon
      • com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Sword

  • class Sword
extends Weapon
    This class is used for creating Sword objects; it is a subclass of Weapon.
    Author:
    Wyatt Byroade

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int bladeLength
      The bladeLength int field represents the length of blade of the sword object.
      private int sharpness
      The sharpness int field sharpness factor of the sword, which affects attack damage.

      • Fields inherited from class com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Weapon

        condition, cost, hitPoints, inHand, needsAmmo, playerOwns, skillWithWeapon, weight

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Sword(double cost, int bladeLength, int weight, int condition, int hitPoints)
      Constructor for Sword class; takes arguments for cost, bladeLength, weight, condition and hitPoints.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attack()
      The attack method calculates and returns attack damage as well as decreasing the sharpness of the Sword object.
      void setSharpness(int sharpness)
      The setSharpness method sets sharpness to the value of passed argument.
      void sharpen()
      The sharpen method increases the sharpness field by 10.

      • Methods inherited from class com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Weapon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sword

        public Sword(double cost,
             int bladeLength,
             int weight,
             int condition,
             int hitPoints)
        Constructor for Sword class; takes arguments for cost, bladeLength, weight, condition and hitPoints.

        Runs constructor of parent class(Weapon) then runs some Sword-specific methods and sets Sword-specific fields.

        Parameters:
        cost - double cost of weapon
        bladeLength - int length of blade
        weight - int weight of weapon
        condition - int condition of weapon(1-100)
        hitPoints - int hitPoints of weapon

    • Method Detail

      • setSharpness

        public void setSharpness(int sharpness)
        The setSharpness method sets sharpness to the value of passed argument.
        Parameters:
        sharpness - int sharpness of weapon to be set

      • attack

        public int attack()
        The attack method calculates and returns attack damage as well as decreasing the sharpness of the Sword object.
        Overrides:
        attack in class Weapon
        Returns:
        int attack damage

      • sharpen

        public void sharpen()
        The sharpen method increases the sharpness field by 10.
